title: India's a fast-growing market for Agoda, will not slow down: CEO Omri Morgenshtern
description: Agoda is intensifying its focus on the Indian market, with significant growth in domestic, inbound, and outbound travel. The company has established a customer experience group and an engineering hub in India. Inbound searches for India have increased by 24%, and Agoda is expanding its property listings rapidly in the country.
